00030 #include "dir.h"
00031 
00032 Dir::Dir()
00033 {
00034     this->_TABLE="dir";
00035 }
00036 
00037 QList<QStringList> Dir::getFieldsByPrefixId(const QString prefix_id) const{
00038     QList<QStringList> valuelist;
00039 
00040     QSqlQuery query;
00041     query.prepare("SELECT id, name FROM dir WHERE prefix_id=:prefix_id");
00042     query.bindValue(":prefix_id", prefix_id);
00043 
00044     if (query.exec()){
00045         while (query.next()) {
00046             QStringList values;
00047             int i=0;
00048             while (query.value(i).isValid()){
00049                 values.append(query.value(i).toString());
00050                 i++;
00051             }
00052             valuelist.append(values);
00053         }
00054     } else {
00055         qDebug()<<"SqlError: "<<query.lastError();
00056         valuelist.clear();
00057     }
00058     return valuelist;
00059 }
00060 
00061 QList<QStringList> Dir::getFieldsByPrefixName(const QString prefix_name) const{
00062     QList<QStringList> valuelist;
00063 
00064     QSqlQuery query;
00065     query.prepare("SELECT id, name FROM dir WHERE prefix_id=(SELECT id FROM prefix WHERE name=:prefix_name)");
00066     query.bindValue(":prefix_name", prefix_name);
00067 
00068     if (query.exec()){
00069         while (query.next()) {
00070             QStringList values;
00071             int i=0;
00072             while (query.value(i).isValid()){
00073                 values.append(query.value(i).toString());
00074                 i++;
00075             }
00076             valuelist.append(values);
00077         }
00078     } else {
00079         qDebug()<<"SqlError: "<<query.lastError();
00080         valuelist.clear();
00081     }
00082     return valuelist;
00083 }

00085 bool  Dir::delDir(const QString prefix_name, const QString dir_name) const{
00086     QSqlQuery query;
00087     if (dir_name.isEmpty()){
00088         query.prepare("DELETE FROM dir WHERE prefix_id=(SELECT id FROM prefix WHERE name=:prefix_name)");
00089     } else {
00090         query.prepare("DELETE FROM dir WHERE prefix_id=(SELECT id FROM prefix WHERE name=:prefix_name) and name=:dir_name");
00091         query.bindValue(":dir_name", dir_name);
00092     }
00093     query.bindValue(":prefix_name", prefix_name);
00094 
00095     if (!query.exec()){
00096         qDebug()<<"SqlError: "<<query.lastError()<<query.executedQuery();
00097         return false;
00098     }
00099     return true;
00100 }
00101 
00102 bool Dir::addDir(const QString prefix_name, const QString dir_name) const{
00103     QSqlQuery query;
00104     query.prepare("INSERT INTO dir(name, prefix_id) VALUES(:name, (SELECT id FROM prefix WHERE name=:prefix_name))");
00105     query.bindValue(":prefix_name", prefix_name);
00106     query.bindValue(":name", dir_name);
00107 
00108     if (!query.exec()){
00109         qDebug()<<"SqlError: "<<query.lastError()<<query.executedQuery();
00110         return false;
00111     }
00112     return true;
00113 }
00114 
00115 bool Dir::isExistsByName(const QString prefix_name, const QString dir_name) const{
00116     QSqlQuery query;
00117     query.prepare("SELECT id FROM dir WHERE prefix_id=(SELECT id FROM prefix WHERE name=:prefix_name) AND name=:dir_name");
00118     query.bindValue(":prefix_name", prefix_name);
00119     query.bindValue(":dir_name", dir_name);
00120 
00121     if (!query.exec()){
00122         qDebug()<<"SqlError: "<<query.lastError()<<query.executedQuery();
00123         return false;
00124     }
00125 
00126     query.first();
00127     if (query.isValid()){
00128         return true;
00129     }
00130 
00131     return false;
00132 }
00133 
00134 QString Dir::getId(const QString dir_name, const QString prefix_name) const{
00135     QString value;
00136     QSqlQuery query;
00137 
00138     query.prepare("SELECT id FROM dir WHERE name=:dir_name and prefix_id=(SELECT id FROM prefix WHERE name=:prefix_name)");
00139     query.bindValue(":dir_name", dir_name);
00140     query.bindValue(":prefix_name", prefix_name);
00141 
00142     if (query.exec()){
00143         query.first();
00144         if (query.isValid()){
00145         int i=0;
00146             while (query.value(i).isValid()){
00147                 value.append(query.value(i).toString());
00148                 i++;
00149             }
00150         }
00151     } else {
00152         qDebug()<<"SqlError: "<<query.lastError();
00153     }
00154     return value;
00155 }

00157 bool Dir::renameDir(const QString dir_name, const QString prefix_name, const QString new_dir_name) const{
00158     QSqlQuery query;
00159     query.prepare("UPDATE dir SET name=:new_dir_name WHERE name=:dir_name AND prefix_id=(SELECT id FROM prefix WHERE name=:prefix_name)");
00160     query.bindValue(":prefix_name", prefix_name);
00161     query.bindValue(":new_dir_name", new_dir_name);
00162     query.bindValue(":dir_name", dir_name);
00163 
00164     if (!query.exec()){
00165         qDebug()<<"SqlError: "<<query.lastError()<<query.executedQuery();
00166         return false;
00167     }
00168 
00169     return true;
00170 }
